name: Hard I Still Love Lucy Quiz / Test | I Love Lucy | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was Mrs. Trumball's first name?
questions.explanation:
Mathilda.

	Mrs. Trumball was played by Elizabeth Patterson from 1953 to 1956, who also played Mrs. Willoughby in the episode "The Marriage License". Her career started in the movie "The Boy Friend" from 1925.

questions.text: Which character was played by Kathryn Card?
questions.explanation:
Mrs. MacGillicuddy

	Kathryn Card played Lucy's mother from 1955 to 1956.  Caroline Appleby was played by Doris Singleton. Betty Ramsey was played by Mary Jane Croft and Marion Strong was played by Shirley Mitchell. Kathryn also played the character Minnie Finch" in the episode "Fan Magazine".  She got her start in the 1945 move "Kiss and Tell".

questions.text: TV Producer Aaron Spelling appeared in which "I Love Lucy" episode?
questions.explanation:
Tennessee Bound.

	He played the gas station man.  The following shows are ones that he's produced: "Hart to Hart", "Dynasty", "T J Hooker", "Beverly Hills 90210", and countless others.

questions.text: In the episode "Lucy Plays Cupid", who played Mr. Ritter, the owner of the grocery store?
questions.explanation:
Edward Everett Horton.

	Edward Everett Horton was better known as the narrator of "Fractured Fairy Tales" which was seen as part of "The Bullwinkle Show."

questions.text: Who played Arthur, the boy who gets a crush on Lucy in the episode "The Young Fans"?
questions.explanation:
Richard Crenna.

	Richard Crenna began his TV career as Walter Denton in the show "Our Miss Brooks" and has appeared in the movies "Wait Until Dark", "First Blood", and  "The Flamingo Kid".

questions.text: Who played Diana Jordan in the episode "Country Club Dance"?
questions.explanation:
Barbara Eden.

	This episode is from the time they lived in Connecticut.  Barbara Eden is much better remembered for her role as Jeannie on "I Dream of Jeannie."

questions.text: Who played Ricky's boss Mr. Littlefield?
questions.explanation:
Gale Gordon.

	Gale Gordon starred with Lucille Ball in "The Lucille Ball Show", "Here's Lucy", and "Life with Lucy".  Both he and Joseph Kearns played Mr. Wilson on "Dennis the Menace".

questions.text: In the episode "L.A. at Last", which person played himself/herself besides William Holden in the scene at the Brown Derby?
questions.explanation:
Eve Arden.

	Eve Arden is most known for her role on the show "Our Miss Brooks". Rock Hudson and Hedda Hopper both appeared in later Hollywood episodes. Eva Gabor's name was only mentioned in the Brown Derby.

questions.text: In the episode "Lucy Meets the Queen", who played the role of the maid?
questions.explanation:
Nancy Kulp.

	Nancy Kulp is better remembered for playing Miss Jane Hathaway on "The Beverly Hillbillies".

questions.text: In the episode "The Charm School", who played the operator of the charm school?
questions.explanation:
Natalie Schafer.

	Natalie Schafer is better remembered for playing Mrs. Howell on "Gilligan's Island".
